reference.title: Lesson 9 : Online Content
reference.shortdesc: Lesson 9 teaches concepts of online content such as HTML, CSS, and XML and allows students time to work in project groups toward their formal report project.

ul.li: Review the technologies for writing and delivering content online.
Examine the design of technical documents through online media.

strow.stentry: Online content articles and/or tutorials: Material you believe to be appropriate for learning about online content concepts such as HTML, CSS, and XMLMany related tutorials are available at Lynda.com (available to Virginia Tech faculty and students for free).

Online content: Concepts on the technology and design of online content such as HTML, CSS, and XML
Group project work: Allocated time for project groups to work on their formal report (proposal and/or a recommendation report)
